name: ProtonMail (unofficial)
description: Unofficial ProtonMail extension. Provides notifications and makes it possible to close ProtonMail without getting logged out.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src https://mail.proton.me/api/events/ https://mail.proton.me/api/messages/count https://mail.proton.me/api/messages https://mail.proton.me/api/messages/read https://mail.proton.me/api/settings/mail https://mail.proton.me/api/auth/refresh https://mail.protonmailrmez3lotccipshtkleegetolb73fuirgj7r4o4vfu7ozyd.onion/api/events/ https://mail.protonmailrmez3lotccipshtkleegetolb73fuirgj7r4o4vfu7ozyd.onion/api/messages/count https://mail.protonmailrmez3lotccipshtkleegetolb73fuirgj7r4o4vfu7ozyd.onion/api/messages https://mail.protonmailrmez3lotccipshtkleegetolb73fuirgj7r4o4vfu7ozyd.onion/api/messages/read https://mail.protonmailrmez3lotccipshtkleegetolb73fuirgj7r4o4vfu7ozyd.onion/api/settings/mail https://mail.protonmailrmez3lotccipshtkleegetolb73fuirgj7r4o4vfu7ozyd.onion/api/auth/refresh
